text:
A Moment of Decision

A canal bank, a man lost in thought.  
His heart feels hollow and empty.  
Man: "Well, itâ€™s a way out of it."  

---

A side street, indecision in the air.  
Man: "What an end! Is it really the end?"  
Man: "How tired I am... so stupid!"  

---

A familiar staircase, darkness enveloping him.  
Man: "An overwhelming prompting draws me on."  
Man: "I must go up... face it."

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The protagonist experiences a profound sense of apathy and confusion as he contemplates his fate while walking towards the police office.
